alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 17 at 7:23AM MDT until May 17 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...DENSE SMOKE ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FORT PECK LAKE... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, northwest winds 15 to 25 mph expected. For the Dense Smoke Advisory, visibility as low as a quarter mile in dense smoke. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Garfield and McCone Counties. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, from noon today to 7 PM MDT this evening. For the Dense Smoke Advisory, from noon today to 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. Persons with respiratory illnesses should remain indoors to avoid inhaling smoke. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; McCone
